content: WASHINGTON U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter said on Thursday his occasional use of a personal email account for work-related matters was "a mistake" that he stopped a few months ago when it became clear to him it was against policy. | Video
name: Carter's Inc

content: Aug 17 A retired New Jersey hedge fund founder was acquitted on Monday on charges that he illegally traded in shares of children's apparel maker Carter's Inc in a rare defense trial win in an insider trading case.
name: Carter's Inc
title: N.J. hedge fund manager cleared of Carter's insider trading charges
